item.title: This Simple Trick Will Help You Remember How to Spell 'Communion' Every Time!
item.description: This Simple Trick Will Help You Remember How to Spell ‘Communion’ Every Time! Do you often find yourself forgetting how to spell the word “Communion”? If so, this simple trick will help you remember it every time! Introduction The word “Communion” has two syllables and is defined as the sharing or exchanging of intimate thoughts and feelings, especially when the exchange is on a mental or spiritual level. This simple trick involves breaking the word into syllables and then associating those syllables with visual images.
